name: Sprite Manager
description: Sprite sheet manager for game development. Upload sprite sheets, define animations, and export sprite data for characters and objects.
author: StickerNest

loadSpriteSheet.description: Load a sprite sheet {imageData, name, config?}

setFrameConfig.description: Set frame configuration {rows, cols, frameWidth, frameHeight}

addAnimation.description: Add an animation definition {name, frames, fps, loop}

importFromGenerator.description: Import sprite data from AI generator widget

spriteData.description: Complete sprite data including sheet and animations

frameSelected.description: Emitted when a frame is selected {index, x, y, width, height}

animationCreated.description: Emitted when an animation is created

spriteReady.description: Emitted when sprite is ready to be used by other widgets
